name: Labytubes Windows
description:
Use your mind to complete all 25 levels to use indifiers which allow you to choose ball's directions. Ball pass tubes and you have to :

-Get bonuses

-Avoid many obstacles

-Interact with objects

-And most of all : solve hard ways to exit tubes labyriths to touch the famous flag near more and more difficults levels where labyrinths are very hard to pass successfully.
